profile:
At Millers Painting We know just how important your home or commercial property is to you and we are dedicated to providing a high quality paint job that will look great for years to come.

From our extreme detail on preparation down to the final finishing coat. Millers Painting takes great pride in our work. Our team of professionals offer many years of experience so nothing goes unnoticed. We spend 90% of our time on preparation. Without the right prep the product could fail and the end result wont be as fabulous. From patching your walls, priming, caulking baseboards, window, and door trim. Pole sanding your wall before painting and in between coats, to provide the smoothest looks and finish. For exterior work we scrape off old paint and sand.  We also restore or replace any old rotten wood. Pressure wash to make sure all dirt and debris is removed for maximum adhesion of paint and stain.
* References Available 
* Fully Insured $2,000,000 Residential and commercial
* WSIB $1,000,000
* Free estimates
* 5 Year warranty on interior repaints
* All employees are certified with, Working at Heights, Fall Safety, WHMIS, Background checks

Areas Served
Ottawa, Kemptville, Kanata, Barrhaven, Nepean, Manotick, Stittsville, Carp, Westboro, Riverside, Orleans, Cumberland, Gloucester, Brockville, Prescott, Spencerville,
services: Interior and exterior painting and stain for residential and commercial.  Roof painting, Stipple removal, Power washing, Gutter cleaning, Driveway sealing.
specialities:
Interior & exterior paint/stain, Deck & fence paint/stain, Roof painting, Stipple removal,
Power washing
payment_method: Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Cheque, E-transfer/Debit
name: Millers Painting

profile:
Welcome to E. Guerra Construction 

If you want to transform your home into something extraordinary but can’t find the missing ingredient to bring your vision to life, look no further. E. Guerra Construction offers the remodeling and construction services you can count on. Sooner or later, even the nicest home will need fixing-up due to wear and tear, and a renovation project is a perfect opportunity to express your creativity and update your home’s look. With our professional home improvement services, we can take on all the remodeling projects that you’ve wanted to do.

profile: Thank you for your interest in OQP co. For over 11 years, we have been providing top-rated services within the multifamily, commercial, and residential spaces. Our goal has always been that you receive reliable products and prompt installations of unmatched quality. Our Ottawa service area, quality workmanship and competitive pricing have earned us multiple recognitions within these industries and can easily be reaffirmed by our growing list of satisfied customers. Professional Residential and commercial painting company with a special knack for customer service. Catering to Homeowners, Businesses, Realtors and their clients. profile:
M&T Painting has been serving Ottawa and surrounding areas for over 10 years with top quailty painting.
We specialize in residential and commercial interior paint applications.
We are often able to book on short notice and understand the demand of completing jobs under a deadline while still maintaining a high quality finished product. We also offer a number of handyman services to residentail customers.
Please feel free to call or e-mail Mike or Tim for free quote.
